mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.POST_ID, B.PARENT_COMMENT_ID, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTENT, B.POST_DATE, B.FIXED, B.FAQ, B.LOCATION, B.READ, B.BOARD_ID, B.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.POST_ID DESC) AS rnum FROM BOARD_POST B LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON B.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE B.BOARD_ID = 999 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * 10 + 1 AND #{page} * 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.POST_ID, B.PARENT_COMMENT_ID, B.POST_TITLE, B.POST_CONTENT, B.POST_DATE, B.FIXED, B.FAQ, B.LOCATION, B.READ, B.BOARD_ID, B.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.POST_ID DESC) AS rnum FROM BOARD_POST B LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON B.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE B.BOARD_ID = 999 AND B.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * 10 + 1 AND #{page} * 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_POST WHERE BOARD_ID = 999
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_POST WHERE BOARD_ID = 999 AND POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
